title: AI SDK Chat Kernel
description: Settings for the AI SDK Chat Kernel

defaultProvider.title: Default Provider
defaultProvider.description: The AI provider to use. Leave empty for auto-selection. Options: 'built-in-ai/core' (Chrome/Edge Prompt API), 'built-in-ai/webllm' (WebLLM local inference), 'built-in-ai/transformers' (Transformers.js local inference), 'openai', 'anthropic', 'google'. Auto-select will try core → webllm → transformers in order.

defaultModel.title: Default Model
defaultModel.description: The model to use. For built-in-ai/core: 'text'. For built-in-ai/transformers: HuggingFace model IDs. For built-in-ai/webllm: any model from %chat list. For cloud providers: see provider docs. Use %chat list <provider> to see available models.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: API key for cloud providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google). Not needed for built-in-ai providers. The key is stored in browser local storage.
